release.action: COMPAT BUSTER:Refactored the package from org.tigransoft to org.osjava, and renamed the package from TigThreads to OSJava-Threads.
COMPAT BUSTER: Renamed getAbort() methods to isAborting() in all classes.
Improved API to work better with threads that implement ExtendedRunnable, but do not extend ExtendedThread.
AbstractExtendedRunnable, and ExtendedThread are made uncloneable.

Added mechanism to notify managed Threads that are in a wait state and wake them up safely. The necessary synchronization is done and it doesn't require looking up the actual thread object, as it's done by name.

COMPAT BUSTER: Added ThreadContext to replace ExtendedThreadGroup and ThreadManager. This is a more flexible means of handling the grouping and management of Threads. This created a dependancy on Simple-JNDI.
COMPAT BUSTER: Removed ExtendedThreadGroup, ThreadManager, InvalidThreadGroupParentException, InvalidThreadParentException.
